phrases: Well done, everyone.
I have been expecting you.
Thank you very much, Freeza- sama.
Please tell us what our mission is this time.
The traitor Vegeta has taken the Dragon Balls that I had gathered, and fled.
Vegeta...
Hey, that is that Saiyan, right?
I hear he is quite the arrogant bastard, for someone who does not have that much power.
Vegeta has betrayed Freeza- sama...
However, for whatever reason, his battle power is starting to rise higher and higher.
Although, he should still be no match for you.
Please rough him up so as not to kill him, and bring him back here.
I would like to force him to tell me where he has hidden the Dragon Balls.
That will be a simple task.
Our Scouters are already tracking Vegeta.
He appears to be traveling at high speed not too far from here.
What is the matter?
Who might these other two who are with him be?
They appear to have a fairly high battle power.
Two of them?
Ah, those must be the two children who interfered earlier.
So they have teamed up with each other, have they?
What are we to do with them?
You are to kill them.
-Lucky!
-Hooray!
Hooray!
Understood.
Let us go thoroughly enjoy ourselves.
At the heart of it all,
you are no more than just a Saiyan monkey, kneeling under our rule.
Do not go thinking you are on an equal level with us,
just because Freeza- sama has taken a liking to you!
As perfect as Freeza- sama might be in everything else,
there is still one thing that I cannot comprehend.
And that is how someone as useless as you are
has been admitted into the Ginyu Special Corps.
What!?
Try saying that again!
Do not breathe next to me.
It stinks so bad, I cannot stand it.
I will show you whether or not I am useless!
This is no time to be playing around...
A very nice planet has been found.
It should sell at a high price.
Let us go see it- just the two of us.
As you wish.
Looks like you got away with your life.
You are a lucky one, at least.
That miserable Vegeta...
Oh my, what is the matter, Ghurd?
Do you have to go potty?
No, it is nothing.
Freeza- sama, the Scouters you ordered are in this case.
Well done.
Well then, we will be off.
Special Corps!
Ginyu!
Fight!
They have started moving.
T- they are fast!
Hurry!
They are going to overtake us!
These strong guys are coming at us, one after the next...
There is nothing we can do!
Father!
20 minutes to arrival at Planet Namek. 20 minutes to arrival at Planet Namek.
All right...
Oh yeah...
Kaio- sama did not have to send me so many of them.
Someone even more incredible than Vegeta, huh?
Stay alive, everyone.
Ten more minutes...
It is funny.
I do not feel any fear.
What am I so relaxed for?
There is going to be someone unbelievable out there...
Maybe training in all that outrageous gravity has made me crazy.
Over there!
We have got them all!
Come on!
What is the matter!?
Get over here, now!
Why, you!
Gohan, no matter how I think this through, it is not right.
How can we let this guy have eternal life?
Do not give me that now!
Hurry up and turn over your Ball!
We do not have time to dawdle!
Yo, Veggie- chan.
It is been a long time, huh?
Dammit!
And I was so close!
They are fast!
They were so fast, I did not even know they were approaching!
By any chance, is that one of those Dragon Ball things?
There are five of them lying over here.
This is all because you were so slow!
H- how can you say that?
Freeza- sama will be overjoyed by this.
You have to get all seven Dragon Balls together, right?
There are five of them behind us, and you have got two of them.
That is all of them, is not it?
W - what Vegeta said was true.
l'm no match for them!
And that guy is exceptionally amazing, even among these guys.
Y- you think we are going to just hand them over to you!?
You seem to have it all wrong.
Without Freeza- sama's power, you cannot do anything!
Watch what you are saying!
What!?
Come on!
Come on!
That guy... that guy alone is really not all that tough.
W - why is that guy mixed in with them?
Stay back!
You smell so bad, I cannot take it.
-Die!!
-Whoa!
Do not go acting on your own, Ghurd.
It is not like we have decided that he is your prey yet.
Why do not you hand that over right now, Vegeta?
Although, even if you do hand it over quietly,
we have no intention of turning a blind eye to you.
You guys may be able to search for people with your Scouters,
but I doubt you can search for these.
What of it?
This is what!
I am back.
That is too bad.
It looked like you were trying to throw it far away.
Unfortunately for you, Butta's speed is the fastest in the universe.
T- that is impossible!
Now then, the other one...
Destroy it!
Damn it all!
The Dragon Ball...
H- how?
So the rumors were true, were they?
What do you mean, rumors?
They say that Ghurd is able to control and stop time,
momentary though it may be.
T- that cannot be true...
It is true, all right.
Well then, that makes all of them.
Now, for your turn.
We are going to give you plenty of tender loving care.
And when he says tender loving care,
he does not mean patting your head, and tossing you up in the air.
He means we are going to hurt you.
You do not have to explain that!
Vegeta, is fighting them the only thing we can do?
You must have realized running away would be futile.
Having you guys around is better than nothing.
Even knowing the extent of your power
you showed me on Earth will be useless, I will still be counting on it.
I will take Vegeta.
You guys decide who gets the other two
unknown pipsqueaks by rock-paper-scissors.
-Why do you always do this?
-That is not fair!
-You cannot do that, Commander Ginyu!
-Yeah!
You took the tastiest piece last time, too, did not you!?
You cannot do that!
Let me have him!
I owe him one!
I guess I have got no choice.
All right then, I will take the Dragon Balls to Freeza- sama.
You guys take care of the rest on your own.
Hooray!
I am nice to you, are not I?
Yeah, you are the best!
Well, first will be Vegeta,
second will be...
Those guys are a set.
All right, let us go!
Rock, paper, scissors!
Tie, go again!...
Tie, go again!...
Could not we get away now?
Hooray!
I get Vegeta!
D- damn it!
Cheer up.
It is better than him not getting killed at all.
Understand, that is how it goes.
But I will let you strike the finishing blow.
Now Freeza- sama will be able to gain youth immortal.
I will not let you have them!
Stop!
Do not waste your energy!
Right now, concentrate only on defeating these guys,
instead of worrying about him, you idiot!
Hey, come here a minute.
Oh, oh, a strategy meeting, huh?
That Ghurd guy that you will be fighting has a low battle power,
but he uses supernatural abilities.
Do not let your guard down.
Yeah.
By the way, is Kakarrot really not here on this planet?
No, he is not.
But he is headed here.
Hurry and get here!
He may be an infuriating bastard,
but if we can get another ally, it will add some to our potential for battle.
Why in the world did we even come here to this faraway place?
Far from being able to get the Dragon Balls together,
we are instead letting the bad guys get eternal life!
Darn it!
Huh?
This is disappointing, huh?
Ghurd, you go first.
Tch...
What am I, some kind of battlefield garbage-collector?
What can I do?
But ReaCoom, make sure you really save some for me!
They are the same ludicrous bunch as ever!
Gohan, remember the image training we did on the spaceship.
This looks like it is going to be over in no time.
All right, let us go!
Release your Ki!
What is this?
A full-power leadoff attack...
A fierce, all-out battle, the likes of which had not been seen before, had begun at last.
